goal_name: An inclusive society which upholds human dignity and where the rights of all Ni-Vanuatu including women, youth, vulnerable groups and the elderly are supported, protected and promoted in our legislation and institutions
target_name: Ensure all people, including people with disabilities, have access to government services, buildings and public spaces
indicator_name: Proportion of Government Offices and public facilities with ramp access or some disability friendly rating
